AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a young scout, training to be a hunter for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] works with the older hunters to, learn the game paths and watering holes, and how to treat the scrapes and bruises that may happen along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian wrestler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was strong fron the time [PAWN_pronoun] was hatched, and could often be found wrestling and rough-housing with other youths.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in an ancient monastery devoted to martial arts. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised to master various forms of physical combat and extend his physical limitations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Curious hatchling
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always the curious one. Getting into things - making some small trouble for the tenders at the hatching-pools, but never anything malicious. This curiosity never faded, and grew into a thirst for all knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Little digger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was constantly playing in the mud or sand, anywhere [PAWN_pronoun] could dig and burrow and build. The others used to chuckle a bit, that [PAWN_pronoun] must be part Kwama.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves rocks and digging. [PAWN_pronoun] feels right at home in a dank cave, so long as [PAWN_pronoun] has a pick and a light. However, an incident involving an overamorous bear has left [PAWN_pronoun] more than reluctant to deal with animals of any kind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian maid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is just a simple maid, sir, and has no idea what you imply.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argo tribesman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Most of the Argonian people are 'simple' tribesmen and women, like [PAWN_nameDef]. A hardy people, due to the harsh environment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Facing the rough winter nights makes you appreciate a good hut. As such, a good builder is a valued member of any Argonian community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice treeminder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised from a hatchling to apprentice under the Tree-Minders. Learning the more mundane toils and herbalism skills needed for their advanced alchemy. Those who are not chosen as Tree-Minders, are still valued as skilled herbalists and healers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Adopted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Rescued from a strange pod, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken in and raised by an old farmer and his wife. Though [PAWN_pronoun] never got the hang of farming, [PAWN_possessive] great strength was a life-saver for the elderly Kents...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian tribe child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a small village. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to carry [PAWN_possessive] weight and keep the tribe fed from an early age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been making little things for [PAWN_possessive] family. Naturally, they encouraged his skill with craftsmanship, and [PAWN_pronoun] is developing into quite the artisan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Weaponsmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a natural talent and love for making blades and weaponry. [PAWN_pronoun] has made sure [PAWN_possessive] tribe has the finest weapons [PAWN_pronoun] can craft.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tends the wounds of the warriors and hunters wounded in combat, and tends to the more mundane illnesses, fevers and injuries among the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] is very well respected for [PAWN_possessive] talents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] makes sure [PAWN_possessive] tribe is well fed, learning the game paths and watering holes. HE makes sure to keep the predators down as well, for [PAWN_possessive] own people, and the game they share.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guar farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had raised Guar for many years in the old swamps. [PAWN_pronoun] has grown quite skilled at handing animals of most kinds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rank-and-file soldier for his tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps dangerous creatures or people from attacking the village, sometimes perhaps raiding other tribes for supplies or people... perhaps.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had the mixed blessing of being the best cook in [PAWN_possessive] large tribe. It means everyone was grateful for fine meals, but [PAWN_pronoun] also often took the blame for a bad case of indigestion. Fortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] has cultivated a fine hand for preparing meals to avoid any grief.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is known as the best healer and herbalist within leagues of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] has learned all about the medical (and other) applications of every plant that can be used in the region, and many beyond, and knows how to properly prepare and apply them to poultices or brews for maximum effect.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian rescued
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped and enslaved, working in a dark mine with little to eat - until a wandering hero (perhaps just looking to loot the cave for himself) freed [PAWN_pronoun] from [PAWN_possessive] bonds. Since then, [PAWN_pronoun] has grown very fond of cooking lavish meals, and still retains a good skill with a pick.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian champion
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is [PAWN_possessive] people's champion. [PAWN_pronoun] has become very skilled in combat after years of defending [PAWN_possessive] tribe from the innumerable threats that they face.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Argonian trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a free-trader, roving the globe searching for deals and opportunities for profit. Until now, [PAWN_pronoun] was heading a caravan, making deals with colonies like these... I wonder what happened?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shadowscale
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to be a skilled assassin, delivering souls to [PAWN_possessive] maker, Sithis.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shadowscale
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent years refining [PAWN_possessive] skills of infiltration and assassination. [PAWN_pronoun] is persuasive, stealthy, and ruthless. A deadly adversary.
